oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1940-03-16 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 16, 1940. Featuring David Stone (announcer), George D. Hay (host), and performers George Wilkerson and his Fruit Jar Drinkers, Pee Wee King and his Golden West Cowboys with vocalists Little Texas Daisy and Lost John, Ford Rush, Ford Rush Jr., and Roy Acuff. Held at War Memorial Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Wilkerson; Fruit Jar Drinkers; Ford Rush; Ford Rush Jr.; Golden West Cowboys; Little Texas Daisy; Lost John; Pee Wee King; Roy Acuff
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: George D. Hay introduces George Wilkerson and his Fruit Jar Drinkers -- Don't Let Your Deal Go Down (George Wilkerson and his Fruit Jar Drinkers) -- Prince Albert commercial (David Stone) -- George D. Hay introduces Ford Rush and Ford Rush Jr. -- I'm Looking Over A Four Leaf Clover (Ford Rush, Ford Rush Jr.) -- George D. Hay introduces the Golden West Cowboys -- Saddle Your Worries To The Wind (Golden West Cowboys trio) -- George D. Hay introduces George Wilkerson and his Fruit Jar Drinkers -- Roll Down The Line (George Wilkerson and his Fruit Jar Drinkers) -- George D. Hay introduces Texas Daisy, Lost John, and the Golden West Cowboys -- Paper Of Pins (Little Texas Daisy, Lost John, Golden West Cowboys) -- George D. Hay introduces Pee Wee King -- St. Louis Blues (Pee Wee King and his Golden West Cowboys) -- Prince Albert commercial (David Stone) -- George D. Hay introduces Roy Acuff -- Sally Ann (Roy Acuff) -- Closing statement (George D. Hay) -- Closing statement (David Stone) -- Network announcements
